title: I am diabetic, can I take insulin shots during fasting? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: [Music] I'm diabetic and in need of regular insulin shots can I take the shots and still keep the fast is there any kuffara I'm required to give insulin shots are not considered to be nourishing nor it goes to your stomach it's a hormone and therefore it has no impact on your fasting at all inshallah [Applause]
